alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:33AM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 5500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 5500 feet. Snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches, with higher amounts over the mountain peaks. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Alpine, Pine-Strawberry, Pinetop-Lakeside and Show Low. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Additional Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 5 PM Today: Alpine 3 to 7 inches Pine-Strawberry 2 to 5 inches Pinetop-Lkside 4 to 8 inches Show Low 3 to 7 inches
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
